howToUseText: Simply start typing or paste your text into the text area above to get instant analysis. The word count, character count, and other metrics will update in real-time. You can also switch between light and dark modes, and change the language of the interface.
aboutText: This Word Counter application is a simple and powerful tool to analyze your text. It provides a variety of metrics to help you understand your writing better. Whether you are a student, a writer, or a professional, this tool can help you improve your writing and meet your goals.
contactText: If you have any questions, feedback, or suggestions, please feel free to reach out to us. We would love to hear from you!
